programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: In the early 1990s, the tourist hotspot of New South Wales, Australia became a place of fear when backpackers started going missing. Over the course of a year, the bodies of seven missing backpackers were found.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: During a time when immigration to Sweden was growing, feelings of racism were also on the rise. On August 2, 1991, one man began to act by shooting young immigrants on the streets of Stockholm. His weapon of choice, a laser-guided rifle, would earn him the nickname “The Laser Man”.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: In 1985, a brutal killer had Southern Californians fearing for their lives. Richard Ramirez, known as “The Night Stalker”, entered homes in the dead of night to terrorize the people inside.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: On July 26, 1983, police in Vero Beach, Florida received a report of a nude man firing shots at a naked girl on a residential street. When they arrived on the scene, officers found the body of a 17-year-old girl hidden in the trunk of a car.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: A newlywed answers the door after her husband leaves for work and ends up in a fight for her life.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: Shelley Nance is discovered by her college roommate stabbed to death, causing gossip to erupt on campus.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: In Biloxi, Mississippi, a well-respected couple is shot dead, causing rumors to spread.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: Melissa Mooney is discovered by her FBI co-workers strangled in her bed.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: After a night of partying, law student Jesse Valencia is found with his throat slashed.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: When David Harmon is bludgeoned to death in his bed, police suspect there is evil in their religious town.

programme.title: Killer in Plain Sight
programme.desc: Taylor Behl vanishes from her college campus and police discover she was involved in a dark world.
